allocation.description: Funds contributed to support the development of the resource.

timePeriod.description: The period for which the allocation is relevant.

sourceAllocationId.description: Identifier used by the source contact to reference the allocation.

amount.description: The amount of the allocation in the indicated currency.

sourceId.description: The contactId of the entity providing the allocation.

recipientId.description: The contactId of the entity receiving the allocation.

responsibleParty.description: Individuals and/or organizations other than source and recipient that serve as contact points or other roles related to the allocation

matching.description: Indicates whether the funds are to be considered matching funds.

comment.description: Additional information relevant to the allocation.

onlineResource.description: On-line information related to the allocation.
